projects.label: Global Goals
projects.title: Choose Your Global Goals
projects.subtitle:
Choose goals that seem interesting to you. You can choose any number of options or nothing at all. You can always change your choice later, and you will also be able to create your own global goals and propose them to the community for discussion.

Please note that the stated goals are meta-projects, whose task, among other things, is to collect, structure and study information on the specified topic. Do not treat this as a clear expression of your own political views, religious or philosophical beliefs, and the like.

campaigns.label: Interests
campaigns.title: Define Interesting Topics
campaigns.subtitle:
Choose topics that interest you to personalize your experience. Select all suitable options or nothing at all. Later on our platform, you will be able to mark other topics, as well as add new options for interesting topics and find like-minded people.

Please note that the specified topics are communities that help you navigate the platform. Do not treat this as a clear expression of your own personal interests, preferences, and the like.

clusters.label: Features
clusters.title: Select Platform Features
clusters.subtitle:
If necessary, you can choose the platform capabilities you want to explore. We will help you get started with the selected features. Also, when you gain access to the corresponding functionality, you will be able to create new capabilities on our platform and give other users access to them.

Please note that selecting this functionality does not guarantee that this functionality will be provided to you immediately or in full: some features may be under development, in test mode, available by invitation, gradually opening to different groups of users, or depend on the type of your account on the platform.

welcome.title: Welcome to Universo Platformo!
welcome.intro: Saluton, hello! My name is Vladimir Levadnij, I am the General Diverseworker at the Teknokomo International Community. Let me introduce myself.
welcome.description1: You are entering an infinite space of exploration and collaboration with like-minded people. Here you can manage organizations, projects, and your own life.
welcome.description2: Our platform helps transform digital twins of enterprises and cities into reality. Together we are building bridges between worlds - virtual and real.
welcome.description4: Use metaverses like Universo MMOOMM: a multiplayer space sandbox game where you unite in organizations, explore the universe, and build an economy. Here you can model chains and projects, transfer solutions to reality through automation and robots, and move between parallel worlds with different economies and rules.
welcome.description3: In the next steps, you will choose the global goals, topics, and platform features that interest you. This will help us personalize your experience and connect you with the right communities.

completion.title: Thank You for Joining Us!
completion.message1: Our platform administrators will review your selections and gradually provide you with the necessary functionality. Your journey has just begun!
completion.message2: Together we act for the common good of workers everywhere. Every world we explore, every project we complete, brings us closer to our great goals.
completion.noticeAlpha: The platform is in alpha version, so it may take weeks or even months to provide functionality to everyone, and there may be some glitches in the operation.
completion.noticeUpdates: We are not currently sending out platform update notifications, so you can follow the platform development yourself in our repositories on
completion.noticeHelp: You can help the platform development with your work and financially, please see the information on
completion.noticeTelegram: You can also receive information about our work in our Telegram channels:
